Rate = 200 ÷ 5 = 40.0 miles per gallon
Distance = 40.0 × 15 = 600 miles

problems.solution:
Total increase = 120000

problems.prompt: A square and a circle have the same perimeter. The square has side length 10 cm. What is the area of the circle? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
